body:
@SteveL-MSFT:  This is essentially what #3647 is about.

I was about to post something there. Do you want us to continue here instead?

I whole heartedly agree.  

BTW for script developers, I'd love to see something like Jeffrey's old `Resolve-ErrorRecord` (which we ship in PSCX) come built-in.  This gives much more (hopefully useful) info for developers:
